requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Any machine running windows 7/8/10 should be able to run this game fast enough, gameplay does not require a high FPS
